name: It's all connected - Trijam Summit
description:
Click on the blocks to rotate. Fox will run automatically to the end if the path its correct. (maybe has a little bug)

Game was made 27-03-22. From 16:00 to 17:30 and From 22:30 to 00:00.

I wish i can add more content, but lose to much time making it look nice.

Total: 3 hours.

Game assets are downloaded from itch.io (with permission)

In web browser version see dark image. But in desktop version looks better.
